channel.title: How the heck do u use scar
channel.description: i downloaded the progrem and i found scripts telling me wat to do but i dont get it can some 1 help me @@@@

item.title: How the heck do u use scar
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:4, topic:74805”][quote author=dbzmaster555 link=topic=109859.msg1096132#msg1096132 date=1175805185]
Ok the next step is you learn how to use scar…
[center] Not helpful or needed.[/center]
[/quote]
May i just say, wtf?
Warned because of that post? It was helpful & needed. If he learns Scar he’ll understand therefore know how “the heck” to use it.

/end rant.[/quote]

I warned him, it doesn’t contain any useful information and a comment like “learn how to use x” is just spam in my opinion. Sure if he had “Ok the next step is you learn how to use scar… Follow the tutorials in the tutorial section” then it would be a perfectly ok post but it isn’t, it’s just spam.

Read full topic
item.source: How the heck do u use scar
